MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the WA8 postcode area of Widnes, affecting properties in Heathfield Park, Moyles Close and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.45PM due to the repairs required to an underground cable fault. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 11.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.54PM on 29th April 2021.
